testcase.name: Homepage Title Verification
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Blazedemo Home Page........................................passed When user gets the title....................................................passed Then page title should appears "BlazeDemo"..................................passed

testcase.name: User verifies all the text in the homepage
testcase.system-out: Given User is on homepage...................................................passed When user gets the header and other text....................................passed Then Page header should be "Welcome to the Simple Travel Agency!"...........passed And Page should contain "Choose your departure city:".......................passed And Page should contain "Choose your destination city:".....................passed

testcase.name: User verifies dropdown text and select departure city
testcase.system-out: Given User is on homepage screen............................................passed When user click on departure city dropdown..................................passed Then User should see list of departure cities in the dropdown...............passed

testcase.name: User verifies dropdown text and select departure city
testcase.system-out: Given User is on homepage screen............................................passed When user click on departure city dropdown..................................passed Then User should see list of departure cities in the dropdown...............passed

testcase.name: User should be able to select departure city and Destination city
testcase.system-out: Given User is on homepage screen............................................passed When user click on departure city dropdown..................................passed Then User should be able to select departure city...........................passed And user click on Destination city dropdown.................................passed Then User should be able to select Destination City.........................passed

testcase.name: Login Button
testcase.system-out: Given user selects destination and departure city...........................passed And user should be able to click Find Flight button.........................passed
